soc.client.stats

Class SOCGameStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • soc.client.stats.SOCGameStatistics

  • public class SOCGameStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
    Track game statistics with event methods such as diceRolled(DiceRollEvent). Events notify any listeners, to update stats if shown on screen in GameStatisticsFrame.
    Since:
    2.0.00

      • getRollCount

        public int getRollCount(int roll,
                        int pn)
        Get how many times a dice result has been rolled by one player.
        Parameters:
        roll - Dice roll result (2-12)
        pn - Player number
        Returns:
        Player's roll result count, or -1 if out of range
